greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Closest number to sigma(n) = A000203(n) which is divisible by n.
comment: In the case of a tie, we round up. - _Robert Israel_, May 26 2019
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: f:= proc(n) uses numtheory; n*floor((floor(n/2)+sigma(n))/n) end proc:
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 22 2003
